data.name: ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - 25th Anniversary DLC -  Experimental Aircraft Series Set
data.detailed_description:
This is a special set that contains 3 experimental aircraft.
As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 10 skins.

Includes the following:
ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-15 S/MTD Set
- Playable Aircraft: F-15 S/MTD
This new-and-improved experimental F-15 is equipped with 2D thrust vectoring nozzles and large canards for increased air combat maneuverability.
This aircraft can equip the HPAA, FAEB, or HVAA as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Sorcerer" skin.

ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - F-16XL Set
- Playable Aircraft: F-16XL
A prototype bomber based on the F-16.
This aircraft can equip the UGB, 4AAM, or 4AGM as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Wizard" skin.

ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN - FB-22 Strike Raptor Set
- Playable Aircraft: FB-22 Strike Raptor
A stealth fighter based on the F-22 with improved explosive firepower.
This aircraft can equip the XSDB, LAAM, or SFFS as its special weapon.
- Includes 7 skins, including the special "Flash" skin.

Bonus 1: 10 Emblems
- 4 Nugget emblems celebrating the 25th anniversary of the series
- 6 emblems from other games in the series, including "Albireo" and "Beast".

Bonus 2: 10 Skins
- 10 skins from enemy squadrons in the series, including "CFA-44 Butterfly Master Skin" and "Su-37 Ofnir Skin".

* Skins and emblems can be changed in campaign mode after completing the mode once. In multiplayer mode, they can be changed right away.

data.short_description: This special set contains 3 ACE COMBAT™ 7: SKIES UNKNOWN add-ons, including the F-15 S/MTD Set, the F-16XL Set, and the FB-22 Strike Raptor Set. As a bonus, it also includes 10 emblems and 10 skins.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Korean, Traditional Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-7100
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750Ti(2GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 50 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 sound card
